column2: "Good work making it all this way. I am Nadereh. I command Retem CIty."
"I am Jalil, advisor to Nadereh."
"As am I, Mohsen."
"I'm Aina, an ARKS from Central City."
"I am Manon."
"We saw a giant DOLLS earlier...what was it?"
"That is Lenus Retem."
"Lenus Retem..."
"It roams the desert as it pleases...most elusively. It is a great trouble to us."
"The damage suffered in its latest rampage was minimal, thankfully. It has been a thorn in our side for years."
"Crawford filled me in on the gist of things. You're hoping for our help in the matter..."
"I'm sorry...we are unable to provide any."
"I have heard of what happened to Aelio Town. Dark Falz is certainly not a threat we can afford to ignore."
"However...we have our hands full already."
"With Lenus Retem."
"So long as it remains at large...it will be too difficult for us to help the other regions."
"You have came all this way for nothing, unfortunately. I am sorry that we must turn you away. Rest, and then return."
"Um, but..."
"Don't be so hasty, Nadereh."
"So Lenus Retem appeared... My apologies for being absent."
"Fret not. Why have you stopped me?"
"These people here possess great strength."
"I confirmed it myself in Central after meeting them in the mountains."
"It seems they defeated Nex Aelio with only a handful of troops."
"This could be the perfect opportunity."
"With their help, we might be able to defeat Lenus Retem."
"Yeah. We'll help you out."
"...Still."
"It's hard to believe that they defeated Nex Aelio."
"This will not be an easy fight in the slightest... Are all of you prepared for that?"
"Of course. We'll do everything we can."
"Do you think you could fill us in on the current situation in Retem?"
